scripts.dev: npm run dev-server & npm run dev-client
scripts.dev-server: cd server && npm install && nodemon server.cjs
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install
scripts.render-build: cd server && npm install && cd .. && npm run setup && npm run client-build
